value:
Oh, Melady... The days we spent
together were my happiest. If only
we had met in peaceful times...

His Majesty gave this Etrurian
outsider a place in Bern... It was only
natural I pledge myself to his service.

Your attire is unsuited to battle. If you
plan on taking to the front lines, you
are either courageous or eccentric.

I am simply tending to my wyvern.
Forming a bond with the partner
you fight alongside comes naturally.

A gathering of wyvern riders from
across many worlds... A gathering of
the elite. I won't soon be bested.

I am Galle, wyvern rider of Bern. I
bear a message from an ally. Are
you $Nu?

Now you ken the strength of the
wyvern riders of Bern!

I cannot take pride in this. I will
continue my training.
Purely an amateur. Pah!

You have my thanks. Know also I will
repay you. That is my way.

I am Galle, wyvern rider of Bern. If
you are honorable, my mount and
I stand ready to aid you.

Ah, $Nu...$k$pOh, it's nothing important. I was just
reflecting on something that happened
long ago...$k$pI believed in my path. I obeyed my
leader, fought my hardest, and yet
was defeated. And I regret none of it.$k$pHowever, here I've been able to speak
to old friends and other Heroes...and
perhaps...another path was open.$k$pI can see what you think of this. I am
a knight. My convictions and loyalties
guide me. I will fight and die for them.$k$pThat is how I live my life. So, let us
go and strike down your foes. I will
take to the skies with a clear heart.
でやっ
甘えるな
くっ…
手練れだな…
Final farewells.
I will crush you.
Was that it?
Hesitation betrays you!
No regret...
ふっ
I am Galle, a knight of Bern.
Melady?! Oh. It's you.
You must crush all who stand in the way of your cause...no matter who they are.
In battle, we are but servants to our betters. It's that simple.
Zeiss doesn't mince words. Melady can count on him.
Oh, Melady... Our days together were the happiest of my life. To have met you was incredible luck.
You have proven yourself worthy of my trust. I am at your command.
Is that so?
Such caution...
We will topple them.
